sections.title: Overview
sections.content: inPowerSuite provides a complete suite of tools for Multi-Level Marketing organizations to manage members, commissions, and operations efficiently.

sections.title: Member Enrollment
sections.paragraph:
* Customizable fields for new members
* Sponsor lookup and assignment
* Enrollment kits and product bundles
* Integration with payment processing

sections.title: Genealogy and Commissions
sections.paragraph:
* Real-time genealogy charts
* Commission statements and reporting
* Historical performance tracking
* Multi-level commission calculation
